data.eml:eml: Description of Phradonoma blabolili sp. n. (Coleoptera, Dermestidae, Megatominae), with notes on the dermestid beetles from Angola

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hava, Jiri, Lackner, Tomas, Mazancova, Jana (2013): Description of Phradonoma blabolili sp. n. (Coleoptera, Dermestidae, Megatominae), with notes on the dermestid beetles from Angola. ZooKeys 293: 65-76, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.293.4891, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.293.4891
